wikipedia_page.main: Stephen Swift (born 21 July 1980) is a Scottish former professional footballer who is manager of Stenhousemuir in Scottish League Two after a playing career in the Scottish Football League.

response: *  Stephen Swift - Cowdenbeath, Linlithgow Rose, Stranraer, Irvine Meadow, BSC Glasgow
Wright joined Lowland League side BSC Glasgow ahead of the 2019-20 season as a first team assistant coach to manager Stephen Swift.
